task.description: Create a basic logbook application structure with support for creating timestamped text notes. Include a web interface with forms for adding text entries and display them in chronological order.
requirements: Create a Flask/Python web application for the logbook
Design HTML templates for adding and viewing text notes
Implement timestamp functionality for each note entry
Create a clean, responsive UI for the logbook
Write comprehensive tests for the functionality
deliverables: HTML templates for note creation and viewing
